snippet: The biologist Edward O. Wilson has a new book, “The Social Conquest of Earth,” and it is already prompting sharp criticism from fellow scientists.
abstract: Biologist Edward O Wilson's latest book The Social Conquest of Earth, which offers a sweeping account of the human rise to domination of the biosphere, is grounded in a view of evolution that has already prompted sharp criticism from his fellow scientists.
lead_paragraph: The biologist Edward O. Wilson has a new book, “The Social Conquest of Earth,” and it is already prompting sharp criticism from fellow scientists.

headline.seo: Edward O. Wilson’s New Book, ‘Social Conquest of Earth’
headline.main: Lessons From Ants to Grasp Humanity
headline.print_headline: Lessons From Ants To Grasp Humanity
